text:
Hello!
Is it possible to parse a date passed into programmable email content through a personalization token into a format like "September 23rd"?
I've tried so many different techniques to get it including parsing it manually.
The date format that comes through the token is like so:
7/31/25

Thank you!
Hi is there a way to tag emails to specific contacts through the outlook HubSpot extension, if the email took place before they were logged as a contact in HubSpot?

also is there a way to directly create a contact from the email extension? for example, if i click the HubSpot extension, it could open a mini browser where i would have access to the create a contact feature
